title: Nick Cannon Presents: Short Circuitz
overview: Nick Cannon pushed the envelope with "Wild N' Out" and it was a hit, so we asked for more. Does that make us geniuses or just crazy? Either way, what he's come up with now is gonna make you laugh. Nick Cannon Presents: Short Circuitz is made up of the same innovative and explosive comedy that's makes "Wild N' Out" so addictive and hilarious. But instead of one-liners and improv raps, Nick's brought in a crew to deliver the laughs in a rapid-fire collection of fake TV Shows, phony news reports, off-the-wall commercial parodies, dead-on celebrity impressions and much more in what Nick calls, "A.D.D. TV.
